name: Little Nightmares
description:
Download the base files and all DLC from GOG. This installer may ask for each file.

The Residence DLC
Scarecrow Sack
Upside-down Teapot
The Hideaway DLC
The Depths DLC

files.the_depths_install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded for The Depths DLC

files.the_residence_install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file for The Residence DLC

files.the_hideaway_install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file for The Hideaway DLC

content:
files:
- install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file
- the_depths_install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded for The Depths
    DLC
- the_residence_install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file for The Residence DLC
- the_hideaway_install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file for The Hideaway DLC
game:
  args: -onethread
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Little Nightmares/Atlas/Binaries/Win64/LittleNightmares.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xact vcrun2013 vcrun2015 win7
    arch: win64
    description: Installing xact
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: install
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: the_depths_install
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: the_residence_install
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: the_hideaway_install
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
